column5: Hi All, Have been reading this board for a while and registered here today. I just recently got back into fishing after being away from the sport for almost 10 years and I've fallen back in love with it again! This weekend I went up to Sturgeon Lake to a buddy's cottage and took the boat out for some fishing. After the cold front passed through Friday night I didn't think I would have any luck but the opposite was true. I was fishing where the rocks meet the weeds around Hawkers Bay and the smallmouth were hitting hard. My buddy was using live minnows and I was using white berklys power grubs on an eerie dearie. Must have caught about 10 nice size smallies within a couple of hours in the morning and got the same results when going in the evening. Wish I took some pics but I forgot my camera at home.  This is a very informative site and I'm looking forward to becoming part of your community and picking up some tips along the way.  Cheers
Welcome to the board!  If you've been lurking for a while, then you know how great it is here already.  Looking forward to more reports...and pictures...we love pictures.
Welcome!!  Don't forget....we like pictures!  dk
Welcome to OFC, nice report! Next time we want to see pics!
